briefdescription.para: Converts any TfError objects in m into python exceptions.

detaileddescription.para: User code should generally not have to call this. User code should generally not have to call this, unless it's manually bridging between C++ & Python.

briefdescription.para: Convert the current python exception to TfError objects and post them to the error system.

detaileddescription.para: User code should generally not have to call this, unless it's manually bridging between C++ & Python.
